ContractPDF.agreementText: The parties above agree to this Educational Services Agreement, which shall be governed by the following clauses:
ContractPDF.clause1Text: The OBJECT of this instrument is the provision of educational services - private language lessons, school tutoring, school monitoring and other activities - tailored to the needs of the CONTRACTOR.
ContractPDF.par1Text: The specific Object of this particular contract is the provision of language lesson service, chosen by the CONTRACTOR in the scheduling stage, and will be taught on a weekly basis, in the amount of times per week chosen by the CONTRACTOR, at the time chosen by the CONTRACTOR.
ContractPDF.par2Text: All classes will be taught remotely, online, through a program to be defined between the parties.
ContractPDF.clause2Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY is obliged to provide the student with the private lesson service informed in the scheduling stage, as described in the Sole Paragraph of Clause 1.
ContractPDF.clause3Text: The CONTRACTOR is obliged to bring to classes the material - book, handout, exercises, etc. - whose study is being carried out, comply with schedules and extracurricular activities.
ContractPDF.parUniqueText: In case of non-compliance with this clause, the CONTRACTED PARTY is not responsible for the progress and quality of the class.
ContractPDF.clause4Text: It is the CONTRACTOR's obligation to make the payment to the CONTRACTED PARTY, of the amount referring to the selected lesson package.
ContractPDF.clause5Text: Payment must be made at the time of hiring, by debit, credit or bank transfer.
ContractPDF.paymentPar1Text: Payment must be made monthly, between the 1st and 10th of each month, during the validity period of this contract.
ContractPDF.paymentPar2Text: Annual Adjustment: Once a year, in July, the contract monthly fee will be subject to a price adjustment. The adjustment will be calculated based on relevant economic indices and according to market variations occurred since the last adjustment. The CONTRACTOR will be duly informed about the price adjustment at least one month in advance of the effective date of the adjustment. The notification will be sent in writing, via electronic communication, specifying the new monthly fee calculated after the adjustment.
ContractPDF.clause6Text: The time and weekly regularity of classes must be chosen by the CONTRACTOR according to availability. All class specifications such as: date, class start time and class duration, must appear on the scheduling form.
ContractPDF.schedulingPar1Text: Non-compliance with Clause 6 may result in a delay in scheduling the class.
ContractPDF.clause7Text: The scheduling of classes is directly linked to the availability of teachers/instructors. If there is no availability for the chosen time, the CONTRACTOR must choose a new date for the classes.
ContractPDF.schedulingPar2Text: Preference in time availability will be given by the order of receipt of scheduling requests.
ContractPDF.clause8Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY is obliged to schedule and book classes within 48 - forty-eight - hours after receiving the request.
ContractPDF.clause9Text: The CONTRACTOR is responsible for providing a suitable environment for classes, treating the teacher/instructor assigned to the class with due respect.
ContractPDF.duringClassesPar1Text: In case of non-compliance with Clause 9, the CONTRACTED PARTY is not responsible for the progress and quality of the class.
ContractPDF.clause10Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY is responsible for providing a suitable environment for classes, treating the student assigned to the class with due respect.
ContractPDF.clause11Text: Classes will be held via video conference between the teacher/instructor and the student.
ContractPDF.duringClassesPar2Text: There may be more than one instructor/teacher in the class with the student.
ContractPDF.clause12Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY is not responsible for the quality of the class if the CONTRACTOR does not maintain a suitable classroom environment.
ContractPDF.clause13Text: Classes may be rescheduled or replaced by the CONTRACTOR twice a month, however, this must occur with a minimum notice of 1 - one - day. These classes do not accumulate for the following months.
ContractPDF.reschedulingPar1Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY has no obligation to notify or remind the student about the class time.
ContractPDF.reschedulingPar2Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY will give a 15-minute delay margin to the CONTRACTOR, after which time the CONTRACTED PARTY has no further obligation to continue, reschedule or replace that day's class.
ContractPDF.clause14Text: This CONTRACT may be terminated by either party with 15 working days' notice to the other party.
ContractPDF.clause15Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY may terminate this contract, after an internal board meeting, for indiscipline of the student represented in this instrument.
ContractPDF.clause16Text: Upon termination, the student will be immediately disconnected from Fluency Lab.
ContractPDF.clause17Text: If termination occurs on the part of the CONTRACTOR, he/she will pay a fee of 50% of the total value of the next monthly fee.
ContractPDF.clause18Text: This contract has a duration of 06 months, counting from the completion of the purchase and may be extended by mutual agreement of both parties.
ContractPDF.clause19Text: The validity of this contract is conditioned on the student's regular enrollment.
ContractPDF.clause20Text: The student's non-attendance in classes does not exempt the CONTRACTOR from paying the class to the CONTRACTED PARTY.
ContractPDF.clause21Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY reserves the right to three weeks of recess during the year, which may be taken consecutively or divided into 1 week each. Not interfering with the monthly payment of classes.
ContractPDF.generalConditionsPar1Text: The CONTRACTED PARTY is obliged to notify 1 month in advance regarding the recess and provide content for all students during the recess period.
ContractPDF.generalConditionsPar2Text: Classes contracted in a current month give the student the right to extra classes equivalent to the number of classes already passed from the first class given. These classes can be done at once or progressively.
